title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4811.3 - Schedules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4811.3 - Schedules

State Regulations

Form BC-2 and accompanying schedules 1 to 7 must be
executed and verified. Where a license has expired (see section 5812.7 of this

Subchapter) and an application for another license is made, form BC-2 shall be
used together with schedules 1 to 7. However, where a license is to be amended
and there is no change in the contents of any particular schedule from the
schedules previously filed, a statement to that effect shall appear in the
application and those schedules may be omitted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4811.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
